article_title: Letter: Medical insurance companies crushing the life out of senior citizens
article_text:
01:35

Granger teacher Stephen Castilleja appears in Benton County Superior Court on two counts of first-degree rape of a child

article_metadata.title: Letter: Medical insurance companies crushing the life out of senior citizens | Tri-City Herald

og.description: I was reading in the Herald recently that the medical insurance companies want to jack up their rates. No kidding? This evil system run by evil human viruses is designed to crush the life out of senior citizens and children alike. You can go into debt trying to pay out-of-pocket medical expenses. It’s a joke, but not funny!
